required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Safety Study in Subjects Using Levemir® (Insulin Detemir) for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
clinical_study.official_title: Observational Safety Study in Subjects Using Levemir® (Insulin Detemir) for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the incidence of serious adverse drug reactions while using insulin detemir under normal clinical practice conditions in the Gulf countries

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of serious adverse drug reactions, evaluated via number of major hypoglycaemic events
primary_outcome.time_frame: For the duration of the study (32 weeks)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: For the duration of the study
For the duration of the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of all - daytime and nocturnal - hypoglycaemic events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: In the 4 weeks before baseline compared to 4 weeks before interim and final visits
At the end of the study
At the end of the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Fasting glucose level control compared to baseline as measured by FBG

intervention.description: Start dose and frequency to be prescribed by the physician as a result of the normal clinical evaluation
